member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraColor
member.summary: A simple RGB color class to represent colors in RGB and YUV colorspaces.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraColor.RGB
member.summary: Gets the RGB byte array (3 bytes).

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraColor.YUV
member.summary: Gets the YUV byte array (3 bytes).

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraColor.ToRgbHex(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a hexadecimal representation of the RGB byte array. Preceded by 0x and all in lowercase.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraColor.ToYuvHex(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a hexadecimal representation of the YUV byte array. Preceded by 0x and all in lowercase.

member.summary: Returns a hexadecimal representation of the data byte array.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraController
member.summary: The Raspberry Pi's camera controller wrapping raspistill and raspivid programs. This class is a singleton.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraController.IsBusy
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the camera module is busy.
member.value: true if this instance is busy; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraController.CaptureImageAsync(Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.exception: Cannot use camera module because it is currently busy.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraController.CaptureImageJpegAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Captures a JPEG encoded image asynchronously at 90% quality.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraController.CaptureImageJpeg(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Captures a JPEG encoded image at 90% quality.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraController.OpenVideoStream(System.Action{System.Byte[]},System.Action)
member.summary: Opens the video stream with a timeout of 0 (running indefinitely) at 1080p resolution, variable bitrate and 25 FPS. No preview is shown.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraController.OpenVideoStream(Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings,System.Action{System.Byte[]},System.Action)
member.summary: Opens the video stream with the supplied settings. Capture Timeout Milliseconds has to be 0 or greater.
member.exception: Cannot use camera module because it is currently busy.
CaptureTimeoutMilliseconds.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraController.CloseVideoStream
member.summary: Closes the video stream of a video stream is open.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect
member.summary: Defines the Raspberry Pi camera's sensor ROI (Region of Interest).

member.name: F:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect.Default
member.summary: The default ROI which is the entire area.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect.X
member.summary: Gets or sets the x in relative coordinates. (0.0 to 1.0).

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets the y location in relative coordinates. (0.0 to 1.0).

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect.W
member.summary: Gets or sets the width in relative coordinates. (0.0 to 1.0).

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect.H
member.summary: Gets or sets the height in relative coordinates. (0.0 to 1.0).

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect.IsDefault
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is equal to the default (The entire area).
member.value: true if this instance is default; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect.Clamp
member.summary: Clamps the members of this ROI to their minimum and maximum values.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraRect.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase
member.summary: A base class to implement raspistill and raspivid wrappers Full documentation available at https://www.raspberrypi.org/documentation/raspbian/applications/camera.md.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureTimeoutMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout milliseconds. Default value is 5000 Recommended value is at least 300 in order to let the light collectors open.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureDisplayPreview
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to show a preview window on the screen.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureDisplayPreviewInFullScreen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a preview window is shown in full screen mode if enabled.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureVideoStabilizationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether video stabilization should be enabled.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureDisplayPreviewOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the display preview opacity only if the display preview property is enabled.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureSensorRoi
member.summary: Gets or sets the capture sensor region of interest in relative coordinates.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureShutterSpeedMicroseconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the capture shutter speed in microseconds. Default -1, Range 0 to 6000000 (equivalent to 6 seconds).

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureExposure
member.summary: Gets or sets the exposure mode.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureExposureCompensation
P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureMeteringMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the capture metering mode.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureWhiteBalanceControl
member.summary: Gets or sets the automatic white balance mode. By default it is set to Auto.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureWhiteBalanceGainBlue
member.summary: Gets or sets the capture white balance gain on the blue channel. Example: 1.25 Only takes effect if White balance control is set to off. Default is 0.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureWhiteBalanceGainRed
member.summary: Gets or sets the capture white balance gain on the red channel. Example: 1.75 Only takes effect if White balance control is set to off. Default is 0.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureDynamicRangeCompensation
member.summary: Gets or sets the dynamic range compensation. DRC changes the images by increasing the range of dark areas, and decreasing the brighter areas. This can improve the image in low light areas.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the picture to take. Less than or equal to 0 in either width or height means maximum resolution available.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CaptureHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the picture to take. Less than or equal to 0 in either width or height means maximum resolution available.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageSharpness
member.summary: Gets or sets the picture sharpness. Default is 0, Range form -100 to 100.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageContrast
member.summary: Gets or sets the picture contrast. Default is 0, Range form -100 to 100.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageBrightness
member.summary: Gets or sets the picture brightness. Default is 50, Range form 0 to 100.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageSaturation
member.summary: Gets or sets the picture saturation. Default is 0, Range form -100 to 100.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageIso
member.summary: Gets or sets the picture ISO. Default is -1 Range is 100 to 800 The higher the value, the more light the sensor absorbs.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageEffect
member.summary: Gets or sets the image capture effect to be applied.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageColorEffectU
member.summary: Gets or sets the color effect U coordinates. Default is -1, Range is 0 to 255 128:128 should be effectively a monochrome image.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageColorEffectV
member.summary: Gets or sets the color effect V coordinates. Default is -1, Range is 0 to 255 128:128 should be effectively a monochrome image.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageRotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the image rotation. Default is no rotation.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageFlipHorizontally
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the image should be flipped horizontally.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageFlipVertically
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the image should be flipped vertically.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageAnnotations
member.summary: Gets or sets the image annotations using a bitmask (or flags) notation. Apply a bitwise OR to the enumeration to include multiple annotations.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageAnnotationsText
member.summary: Gets or sets the image annotations text. Text may include date/time placeholders by using the '%' character, as used by strftime. Example: ABC %Y-%m-%d %X will output ABC 2015-10-28 20:09:33.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageAnnotationFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of the text annotations Default is -1, range is 6 to 160.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageAnnotationFontColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the text annotations.
member.value: The color of the image annotation font.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.ImageAnnotationBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for text annotations.

member.name: M:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraSettingsBase.CreateProcessArguments
member.returns: The string that represents the process arguments.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings
member.summary: Defines a wrapper for the raspistill program and its settings (command-line arguments).

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings.CaptureDisplayPreviewAtResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the preview window (if enabled) uses native capture resolution This may slow down preview FPS.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings.CaptureEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding format the hardware will use for the output.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings.CaptureJpegQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the quality for JPEG only encoding mode. Value ranges from 0 to 100.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings.CaptureJpegIncludeRawBayerMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the JPEG encoder should add raw bayer metadata.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings.CaptureJpegExtendedInfo
member.summary: JPEG EXIF data Keys and values must be already properly escaped. Otherwise the command will fail.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings.HorizontalFlip
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [horizontal flip].

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings.VerticalFlip
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [vertical flip].

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraStillSettings.Rotation
member.exception: Valid range 0-359.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings
member.summary: Represents the raspivid camera settings for video capture functionality.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.CaptureBitrate
member.summary: Use bits per second, so 10Mbits/s would be -b 10000000. For H264, 1080p30 a high quality bitrate would be 15Mbits/s or more. Maximum bitrate is 25Mbits/s (-b 25000000), but much over 17Mbits/s won't show noticeable improvement at 1080p30. Default -1.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.CaptureFramerate
member.summary: Gets or sets the framerate. Default 25, range 2 to 30.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.CaptureKeyframeRate
member.summary: Sets the intra refresh period (GoP) rate for the recorded video. H264 video uses a complete frame (I-frame) every intra refresh period, from which subsequent frames are based. This option specifies the number of frames between each I-frame. Larger numbers here will reduce the size of the resulting video, and smaller numbers make the stream less error-prone.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.CaptureQuantisation
member.summary: Sets the initial quantisation parameter for the stream. Varies from approximately 10 to 40, and will greatly affect the quality of the recording. Higher values reduce quality and decrease file size. Combine this setting with a bitrate of 0 to set a completely variable bitrate.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.CaptureProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets the profile. Sets the H264 profile to be used for the encoding. Default is Main mode.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.CaptureInterleaveHeaders
member.summary: Forces the stream to include PPS and SPS headers on every I-frame. Needed for certain streaming cases e.g. Apple HLS. These headers are small, so don't greatly increase the file size.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.Fullscreen
member.summary: Toggle fullscreen mode for video preview.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.VideoFileName
member.summary: Specifies the path to save video files.

member.name: P:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraVideoSettings.CaptureDisplayPreviewEncoded
member.summary: Switch on an option to display the preview after compression. This will show any compression artefacts in the preview window. In normal operation, the preview will show the camera output prior to being compressed. This option is not guaranteed to work in future releases.
member.value: true if [capture display preview encoded]; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraImageEncodingFormat
member.summary: Defines the available encoding formats for the Raspberry Pi camera module.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraExposureMode
member.summary: Defines the different exposure modes for the Raspberry Pi's camera module.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraWhiteBalanceMode
member.summary: Defines the different AWB (Auto White Balance) modes for the Raspberry Pi's camera module.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraImageEffect
member.summary: Defines the available image effects for the Raspberry Pi's camera module.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraMeteringMode
member.summary: Defines the different metering modes for the Raspberry Pi's camera module.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraImageRotation
member.summary: Defines the different image rotation modes for the Raspberry Pi's camera module.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraDynamicRangeCompensation
member.summary: Defines the different DRC (Dynamic Range Compensation) modes for the Raspberry Pi's camera module Helpful for low light photos.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraAnnotation
member.summary: Defines the bit-wise mask flags for the available annotation elements for the Raspberry Pi's camera module.

member.name: T:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraH264Profile
member.summary: Defines the different H.264 encoding profiles to be used when capturing video.

member.name: F:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraH264Profile.Baseline
member.summary: BP: Primarily for lower-cost applications with limited computing resources, this profile is used widely in videoconferencing and mobile applications.

member.name: F:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraH264Profile.Main
member.summary: MP: Originally intended as the mainstream consumer profile for broadcast and storage applications, the importance of this profile faded when the High profile was developed for those applications.

member.name: F:Unosquare.RaspberryIO.Camera.CameraH264Profile.High
member.summary: HiP: The primary profile for broadcast and disc storage applications, particularly for high-definition television applications (this is the profile adopted into HD DVD and Blu-ray Disc, for example).

member.returns: Returns true or false if the operation was successful.
